text:
GrandRounds | https://www.grandrounds.com/| San Francisco | ONSITE - Data Driven Healthcare

We use data to identify patients, clinical situations and connect them to appropriate experts

We work with billions of very rich (1000 column wide) data points on patients, physicians, claims and more.

Looking for Data Modeling, Data Warehousing Lead, Front-end(react) lead

apply online or message me bashir grandrounds
